column4: Hey people. I'm back. Just ran Ubuntu for the first time, and all I got was a Ms-Dos looking screen. where the hell is my desktop?
No. Not that I know of. just a black screen with a command line on it.
Pogay, i'm a computer idiot. explain just what the hell that means. how do i log in from a black screen with a blinking _ on it.
just try to find out, how your screen looks like
